com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet

Class Facet.QueryFacet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet
      • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet.QueryFacet
  • Enclosing class:
    Facet

    public static class Facet.QueryFacet
extends Facet
    Allows to configure a query facet. A query facet restricts the facet results based on a group of filters.
